branding.description: Upload your store logo and cover photo to personalize your brand.

branding.fileTooLarge: File size exceeds the maximum limit.
branding.noFilesSelected: Please select at least one file to upload.

loyalty.title: Loyalty Program
loyalty.description: Configure your customer loyalty rewards program.
loyalty.tierRestriction: Loyalty program is only available on Standard and Premium tiers. Upgrade your plan to enable this feature.

loyalty.pointRateDescription: Points earned per currency unit spent (e.g., 0.1 = 1 point per 10 THB).
loyalty.redemptionRateDescription: Currency value per 100 points redeemed (e.g., 0.1 = 10 THB per 100 points).
loyalty.expiryDaysDescription: Number of days before loyalty points expire (0-3650 days).
loyalty.updateError: Failed to update loyalty program settings.
